***I'm Sure You're All Wondering Why I've Gathered You Here This Evening*** is a [deadly](https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/TenLittleMurderVictims) [inheritance game](https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/GameBetweenHeirs) set in the [mysterious mansion](https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/OldDarkHouse) of a [wealthy, deceased eccentric](https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/InheritanceMurder) whom all the guests know *somehow* .
Players will [explore the mansion](https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/LuckBasedSearchTechnique), deduce characters' secrets, [vie with fellow guests](https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/ThereCanBeOnlyOne) [to be the last one alive](https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/Tontine), or haunt their killers.
The premise is dark, but the game is more of a melodramatic, farcical play where over-acting is invited. Ham it up. Make grand sweeping gestures, gasp at revelations, and scream when something horrifying happens.
**Content Warning:** murder, PC betrayal, ghosts. We will use Lines & Veils to keep our play enjoyable for everyone.
**System :** [ *I'm Sure You're All Wondering Why I've Gathered You Here This Evening* ](https://logantjenkins.itch.io/im-sure) by Logan Jenkins. No experience necessary; rules will be taught. **Duration :** ~3 hours (I'm allowing an extra half hour for feedback and discussion, although we will likely finish before then) **Breaks :** ~10 minute breaks near the top of the first and second hours **Venue :** StreamYard, playingcards.io **Recording :** With prior consent of all players, I would like to record for personal reference. If we all agree after the session, I may consider posting to YouTube. **Attendance :** All three seats are initially reserved for GFC Camp Starfleet II councilor and cadets: Jim Crocker, Rod Santos, and Vincent Eaton. Once participants have signed up, the wait list is available for general sign-ups. This game will be played using the [Open Door Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/tools-of-the-table.html#:~:text=by%20John%20Stavropoulos.-,The%20Open%20Door%20Policy,-Sometimes%20game%20content). **Safety :** [Lines & Veils](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/tools-of-the-table.html#:~:text=discussed%20before%20play.-,Lines%20%26%20Veils,-Before%20play%2C%20it%E2%80%99s), [X-Card](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/tools-of-the-table.html#:~:text=of%20the%20Table-,The%20X%2DCard,-The%20X%2Dcard), [Open Door Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/tools-of-the-table.html#:~:text=by%20John%20Stavropoulos.-,The%20Open%20Door%20Policy,-Sometimes%20game%20content), [The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html)
